name: Cliffward Holds
role_in_state: Defensive maritime bulwark and concentrated shipbuilding node
economy_niches: Storage and transshipment of imported ritual reagents
Guano/seaweed fertilizer harvest for terraced gardens
culture_adjustments: Stronger clan-keep loyalties over guild neutrality
Ritual navigation tied to fixed cliff flash-sites
Practical fatalism about storms and losses at sea
Elevated military ritualism and watch-duty culture
constraints: Limited arable land; dependence on imports
Access constrained to steep trails and small harbors
High maintenance cost for terraces and fortifications
notes: Shipwright guilds control keel quotas tied to watch-ward obligations
Saltworks use layered evaporation on narrow terraces
Navigation auguries anchored to cliff-scar rites rather than open charts
